Name: The Angel Inn
About the game: Your first adventure begins in four days. And today, you’ve reached “The Angel Inn”, where you can relax before the departure. Is this your lucky day? The only male guest, with 3 beautiful girls. Get to know them, and be wise in managing time in your four days, because good things may happen at The Angel Inn! Meet Shea, the sweet innkeeper, Faylinn, the tsundere fencer with a secret, and Rosabella, the provocative, seductive bard from the Noble Society. “The Angel Inn” is a romantic Visual Novel with 12 possible endings and 18+ NSFW artwork. Keywords - A short romantic story - get attached to them! - Visual Novel and Dating Sim - Gallery with 42 unlockable illustrations - Hentai sex scenes - 12 Endings - In-game achievement system - Manage your time and choose where to go - Your choices affect their opinion of you! And THERE'S MORE! Reach the true love ending for each girl to unlock up to 3 interactive bonus chapters that give more depth and insight to each girls' backstory!
